home.title: Explore and Share Smart Skills
home.subtitle: An open marketplace where developers can easily discover, share, and integrate various smart skills into their applications

search.title: Smart Search
search.desc: Quickly find the skills you need, with keyword search and category filtering

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.desc: Community-driven quality evaluation system to ensure every skill is verified

docs.title: Detailed Documentation
docs.desc: Each skill comes with detailed usage documentation and sample code

register.title: Sign Up
register.subtitle: Fill in the following information to create your account
register.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers

skills.title: Skills Marketplace
skills.searchPlaceholder: Search skill names, descriptions, or tags...
skills.author: Author
skills.discover: Discover over {{count}} high-quality skills to boost your development efficiency

admin.userAddNotImplemented: User addition via admin panel is not implemented. Use the registration form instead.

role.adminDesc: Has full access to all system functions
role.userDesc: Standard user with basic access rights

admin.require2FADesc: Force all users to enable two-factor authentication
admin.enableEmailVerificationDesc: Require users to verify their email addresses
admin.siteMaintenanceDesc: Temporarily disable site access for maintenance

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: SkillHub is committed to building an open and shared skills ecosystem. We believe that by standardizing and modularizing various smart skills, we can greatly lower the threshold for technology integration, allowing developers to focus more on core business logic and accelerate innovation.

plugAndPlay.title: Plug and Play
plugAndPlay.desc: Standardized APIs that can be integrated into your application in just a few simple steps

quality.desc: Strict review mechanisms and community evaluation systems to ensure skill quality

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: Maintained by the developer community with continuous optimization and skill updates

oneClickDeploy.title: One-Click Deployment
oneClickDeploy.desc: Supports multiple deployment methods to meet different environment requirements

easyPublish.title: Easy Publishing
easyPublish.desc: Simple publishing workflow that allows developers to easily share skills

documentation.desc: Detailed usage documentation and examples to reduce learning costs

team.title: Team Introduction
team.description: SkillHub was founded by a group of engineers who love technology and are dedicated to promoting developer ecosystem development. We have rich technical expertise and product experience, focusing on creating the highest quality skill sharing platform.

joinUs.title: Join the SkillHub Ecosystem
joinUs.description: Whether you are a user looking for skills or a developer willing to share skills, SkillHub welcomes your participation

common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

footer.description: Bridging developers and smart skills, making technology more accessible.
